problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AE = EB, AF = N_0, then FC is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∴∠CDE=∠AED,∠DCA=∠CAB,∴△AEF∽△CDF,∴\frac{AF}{CF}=\frac{AE}{CD},∵AE=EB,∴AE=\frac{1}{2}AB,∴AE=\frac{1}{2}CD,即\frac{AE}{CD}=\frac{1}{2},∵AF=2,∴\frac{2}{CF}=\frac{1}{2},即CF=4．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质相似三角形的判定与性质,根据已知得出△AEF∽△CDF是解题关键．
